summary.para: Performs a logical less than on each pair of corresponding elements of the input tensors, placing the result (1 for true, 0 for false) into the corresponding element of OutputTensor.

member.name: DML_ELEMENT_WISE_LOGICAL_LESS_THAN_OPERATOR_DESC.ATensor
member.summary: A tensor containing the left-hand side inputs.

member.name: DML_ELEMENT_WISE_LOGICAL_LESS_THAN_OPERATOR_DESC.BTensor
member.summary: A tensor containing the right-hand side inputs.

member.name: DML_ELEMENT_WISE_LOGICAL_LESS_THAN_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: The output tensor to write the results to.
